words.def: reaching for an object with an empty hand (precursor to grasp).
grasping an object with the active hand.
moving an object (grasped) using a hand motion.
releasing control of an object (letting it go).
positioning and/or orienting an object for the next operation and relative to an approximation location.
positioning and/or orienting an object in the defined location.
manipulating a tool in the intended way during the course working.
joining two or more parts together.
separating multiple components that were joined.
